Package ohos.media.sessioncore

Class AVController.PlayControls

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.sessioncore.AVController.PlayControls
  • Enclosing class:
    AVController

    public final class AVController.PlayControls
extends Object
    An inner class of AVController to send media playback requests to the AVSession and allow your application to send commands to the media session.
    Since:
    3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void pause​()
      Sends a request to pause the current playback.

                                  PacMap options)
        Sends a request to prepare for playing a media item specified by search criteria.
        Parameters:
        query - Indicates the search criteria. If this parameter is null, the application can prepare for any media item.
        options - Indicates additional data to search for.
